prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a playful personality and a cute, round shape.
Imagine a small aquatic creature that loves to play in lakes and rivers.
Generate a starter Pokemon that evolves into a fierce water warrior.
Show me a Pokemon that has both a soft fur and a shiny shell.
Make a friendly water Pokemon that is known for its adorable smile.
Design a tiny Pokemon that can be found in forest streams.
Give me a Pokemon that combines the traits of a sea otter and a water droplet.
